body:
Hi All,

For those who are interested, I just posted an entry on how to sample
virtual work-planes within a scene for the V matrix calculation of the
three phase simulation method.

http://modsimvis.blogspot.com/2013/07/three-phase-simulation-in-radiance_3.html

Best,

-Jack

--
Jack de Valpine
President

Visarc Incorporated
www.visarc.com

channeling technology for superior design and construction
